title: Is there people who repeated or drop year after 12th in pes cse

comments.body:
There are some whom ik from other branches,idk anyone who r in cs personally.

But y is that a concern? nobody will judge dude (if u thought so)

Yes there are many people I know personally who are droppers. And it's pretty chill. No one cares. We are just friends. No one cares if you are a dropper or topper previously. Just focus on the present and chill.
This is different for different people. Perspective lol. Pes is not really strict, but that doesn't mean it is lenient also

PES is extremely academic oriented. You cannot have a gala time and neglect your studies, else, you will pay the price for that lol. It's a good college if you're serious about your studies and it's amazing for building connections with professors and industry professionals.
